code: import axios from"axios";export default{searchBooks:function searchBooks(search){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+search);},getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},getBook:function getBook(id){return axios.get("/api/books/"+id);},saveBook:function saveBook(savedBooks){return axios.post("/api/books",savedBooks);},deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
